group_1.narration: And so Yachiyo shared all of her research with Big Sis.
All the date spots,@and all the stores with fun sweets to eat on a date,@that her senpai had told her about...
It was certainly great advice,@and while Big Sis was a bit perplexed at first,@her face lit up right along with theirs@once she'd heard everything.

group_1.textRight: Thank you so much for looking up all these ideas, Yachiyo-chan...

group_1.textLeft: Mifuyu and I both looked it up together.
Ehh...@I didn't really...do anything that useful...

group_1.textRight: Aw, but it still makes me happy that you were so thoughtful.
Thanks a bunch, Mifuyu-chan.
Hmm... There are so many good spots to choose@from, I'm a little lost...
But I think I'll try inviting him to this exhibit at the modern art museum.
Yeah, I'm pretty sure I remember him telling me@he had a thing for modern art.
So this is a good chance to turn the museum into@our get-together spot!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that sounds like a good plan...!

group_1.textRight: And then... I have a good feeling about this@sweets shop right by the place!

group_1.textLeft: Wow, they make their parfaits with fruit@straight from the farm, huh?

group_1.textRight: Yep!

group_1.textLeft: Mascarpone Parfait...@What kind of flavor would that have...?

group_1.textRight: Hehe...@It sounds really tasty, doesn't it!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:110204:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ah, forgive me...!@I went off on a tangent...

group_1.textRight: Nah, it's alright.
I'm really, really thankful to you both.
I didn't have any experience with this stuff, so@I didn't have much confidence...
I never looked into it on my own, so you guys really helped me out.
If it's you, Big Sis, then I'm certain your date will@turn out all right!
...Thank you.
...Heheh.
Nothing, I just thought it was kind of odd.
You two are younger than I am, but when you're together you both become so brave.

group_1.narration: Summoning her own bravery, Big Sis set out@to invite the one she liked on a successful date.@When the day arrived, she got up@bright and early and set out in high spirits, but...
Yachiyo seemed worried about how it would go,@to the point that she couldn't sit still.
Around noon, after she was finished with lessons,@she got a call from Mifuyu-chan@and immediately headed over in a tizzy@to their meeting place at the Tomorrow Shop.

group_1.textRight: ...Do you think Big Sis is doing all right...?

group_1.textLeft: I don't know, but...@I sure hope she is.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, and I hope they'll have plenty of exciting@stuff to talk about.

group_1.textLeft: What sorts of things would they talk about...
If they go to the same university, maybe they could@talk about their lessons or friend circles.

group_1.textRight: I think they'd also talk about their favorite foods.

group_1.textLeft: ...Mifuyu, is there something you're craving@right now?
Why don't I try and guess?

group_1.textRight: Bzzzt!@That's incorrect.
The correct answer is...
[chara:110204:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]A 'Seasonal Fruit & Mascarpone Heaping-Helping Parfait'!
